import React from 'react'; import data from '../../data/home1/blogs'; function Blog() { return (

Latest Posts

All Articles
{data.map((item, i) => (
{item.num}
{item.history.split('
')[0]}
{' '} {item.history.split('
')[1]}
{item.title} {item.subTitle}
))}
); } export default Blog;
